Constructor Detail

SimpleProgressMonitor

public SimpleProgressMonitor(java.awt.Component pc,
                             java.lang.Object msg,
                             java.lang.String note,
                             int max)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
It started out as a "simple" progress monitor, then a few extras were added: bumpState() which increments the progress counter, and setProgressLine() which sets the note line and bumps the progress counter if the line Matches the progressLineHead string. This is based on our extended ProgressMonitor which allows an extra boolean flag to enable/disable the Cancel button (it is replaced with an "OK" button) and a setPreferredSize(Dimension) method.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
